document.full_text: a snowstorm looked to blanket flood-stricken north dakota on friday and could create conditions similar to those that killed tens of thousands of cattle in other flood years, farm officials in the state said.
document.title: floods, snow threaten n.dakota cattle herd
lines_and_colors: a snowstorm looked to blanket flood-stricken north dakota on friday and could create conditions similar to those that killed tens of thousands of cattle in other flood years, farm officials in the state said.
